text: Ibrahim Arafat Mensah (born 11 January 1995) is a Ghanaian professional footballer who plays for Bravo. ==Career== On 16 August 2018, IK Start announced the signing of Mensah from NK Aluminij. After a half year at the club, it was announced on 13 March 2019 that Mensah's contract had been terminated by mutual consent.Ferdig i Start etter et halvt år: - Kunne vært gjort et bedre forarbeid, aftenposten.no, 13 March 2019 ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |+ Appearances and goals by club, season and competition |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|National Cup !colspan="2"|Continental !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |Bravo |2015–16 |Slovenian Third League |13||14||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||13||14 |- |Krško |2016–17 |Slovenian PrvaLiga |27||4||3||1||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||30||5 |- |rowspan="3"|Aluminij |2017–18 |rowspan="2"|Slovenian PrvaLiga |30||9||5||3||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||35||12 |- |2018–19 |4||1||0||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||4||1 |- !colspan="2"|Total !34!!10!!5!!3!!—!!—!!—!!—!!39!!13 |- |Start |2018 |Eliteserien |2||0||1||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||3||0 |- !colspan="3"|Career total !76!!28!!9!!4!!—!!—!!—!!—!!85!!32 |} ==References== ==External links== *PrvaLiga profile Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Ghanaian footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:NK Krško players Category:NK Aluminij players Category:IK Start players Category:Slovenian PrvaLiga players Category:Eliteserien players Category:Ghanaian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Slovenia Category:Ghanaian expatriate sportspeople in Slovenia Category:Expatriate footballers in Norway Category:Ghanaian expatriate sportspeople in Norway Category:NK Bravo players
